..CIAM

Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) is a crucial cybersecurity framework that enables organizations to securely manage and protect customer identities, control access, and deliver personalized experiences. Unlike traditional identity management systems, CIAM focuses on customer-facing applications, providing a seamless and secure experience for users. By incorporating features such as single sign-on (SSO), multifactor authentication (MFA), and secure data storage, CIAM helps organizations protect customer data against security threats while maintaining compliance with data privacy regulations. In today’s digital world, where data breaches and identity theft are constant risks, .
